paragraphs.body:
The complete transcripts are avilabe in this site. You can add the ones that isn't exist here.
BTW, is there a comfortable way of creating transcripts pages. It seems it annoying to make those using source-mode editing. Galzigler (wall • contribs) 15:14, May 3, 2012 (UTC)
